english.segment1: And this is what you can't explain. A need to take a long long trip on a train. And this is what you cannot say. I want to take a long long trip far away
english.segment2: I can't even talk. Just kick in the rock. I already know what we're going to play
english.segment3: I just want to take the flight. I need a drummer and I need one tonight. And this is what you cannot say. I want to take a long long trip far away
english.segment4: I can't even talk. Just kick in the rock. I already know what we're going to play
